However , direct comparison ARV efficacy person closely reflect worldwide demographic HIV-1 infection need . > > Trial participant recruit Africa ( Malawi , South Africa , Zimbabwe ) , Asia ( India , Thailand ) , South America ( Brazil , Peru ) , Haiti , United States . > > All participant randomly assign one three arm , random allocation stratify 2 factor : country , screen plasma HIV-1 RNA level ( < 100,000 copies/mL versus > = 100,000 copies/mL ) .
